HIVE_METASTORE.name: hive_metastore_process
HIVE_METASTORE.label: Hive Metastore Process
HIVE_METASTORE.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the Hive Metastore process cannot be determined to be up and listening on the network.

parameters.name: check.command.timeout
parameters.description: The maximum time before check command will be killed by timeout

parameters.name: default.smoke.user
parameters.description: The user that will run the Hive commands if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser

parameters.name: default.smoke.principal
parameters.description: The principal to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_principal_name

parameters.name: default.smoke.keytab
parameters.description: The keytab to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_keytab

HIVE_METASTORE.name: sys db status
HIVE_METASTORE.label: Sys DB status
HIVE_METASTORE.description: This alert is triggered if the Sys Db is not created yet.

HIVE_SERVER.name: hive_server_process
HIVE_SERVER.label: HiveServer2 Process
HIVE_SERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the HiveServer cannot be determined to be up and responding to client requests.

parameters.name: check.command.timeout
parameters.description: The maximum time before check command will be killed by timeout

parameters.name: default.smoke.user
parameters.description: The user that will run the Hive commands if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser

parameters.name: default.smoke.principal
parameters.description: The principal to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_principal_name

parameters.name: default.smoke.keytab
parameters.description: The keytab to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_keytab

HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.name: hive_server_interactive_process
HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.label: HiveServer2 Interactive Process
HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the HiveServerInteractive cannot be determined to be up and responding to client requests.

parameters.name: check.command.timeout
parameters.description: The maximum time before check command will be killed by timeout

parameters.name: default.smoke.user
parameters.description: The user that will run the Hive commands if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser

parameters.name: default.smoke.principal
parameters.description: The principal to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_principal_name

parameters.name: default.smoke.keytab
parameters.description: The keytab to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env/smokeuser_keytab

HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.name: llap_application
HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.label: LLAP Application
HIVE_SERVER_INTERACTIVE.description: This alert is triggered if the LLAP Application cannot be determined to be up and responding to requests.

parameters.name: check.command.timeout
parameters.description: The maximum time before check command will be killed by timeout

parameters.name: default.hive.user
parameters.description: The user that will run the Hive commands if not specified in cluster-env

parameters.name: default.hive.principal
parameters.description: The principal to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env

parameters.name: default.hive.keytab
parameters.description: The keytab to use when retrieving the kerberos ticket if not specified in cluster-env.
